text: every day we engage in processes and
transactions with other people
organizations and technology like
contracts and trades depositing money
visiting the doctor or voting but quite
often those transactions lack
transparency take too long or they're
too complicated blockchain technology is
changing how processes are conducted
blockchain is a type of distributed
ledger in which records or blocks are
cryptographically linked to one another
using time stamps and other attributes
block chain can help automate routine
processes it protects data from
unauthorized access or modification and
it's decentralized structure enhances
availability blockchains distributed
trust model lets people build networks
where all agree on the state of the data
companies across many industries are
investing in blockchain solutions to
enhance security provide greater
transaction transparency and transform
daily business processes AWS is a leader
in supporting blockchain solutions
through its broad and deep service
offerings that are leveraged by AWS
partners and customers by building block
chain solutions on AWS they can leverage
our commitment to innovation security
and always putting the customer first
imagine what you could do by running
blockchain solutions on AWS learn more
about how the AWS partner community can
help by visiting the AWS blockchain
Partners website
[Music]
